programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2011
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2011 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep49
programme.desc: Bunker Break-In/To Catch a Critter - When Branch loses to Poppy at Capture the Flag, he challenges her to break into his bunker and steal Gary, to prove her abilities. Poppy organizes a whacky heist with the help of the Snack Pack. /When Smidge accidentally loses some of the critters Milton cares for, she must try and retrieve them from Trolls Forest.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep50
programme.desc: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss - DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJs birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep23
programme.desc: The King Who Would Be King - Fred the Giant Scorpion vows revenge after he reads an untrue story about himself in King Julien's new book.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep24
programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep26
programme.desc: Level Up / Reed and the Beanstalk - The Dews think a double rainbow is making their powers change, but what they discover is that they are about to graduate to a new level of Dew Dropness, with the newfound ability to float in the air! / When Reed discovers hes being assigned a family, he runs to tell Athena, only to find Athena and her house are missing! While Eden and Phoebe search for Athena, Reeds on Dew Drop duty for Athena. After successfully helping Athena's kids, Reed is assigned the family in the apartment below Athena. He now gets to join them on more adventures.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep27
programme.desc: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2 - When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep28
programme.desc: Deus Ex Monkhuaha / Slak Attack - Sandy becomes jealous when the family gets an adorable monkhuahua/Eep and Thunk act like lazy slaks instead of doing their schoolwork and chores

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep34
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bad Beat of the Blah Borelock - With fun in short supply, Harold and George persuade Krupp to dump the campers in the middle of the forest so they can learn to rough it.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep35
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist - The pressure's on Harold and George to tell the scariest campfire story ever. Perhaps their tale of an ill-fated frontier dentist will do the trick.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep57
programme.desc: War of the Cheeks - Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep58
programme.desc: Techy Tykes - Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep19
programme.desc: The Battle(s) of Gongmen Bay - Po and the Kids agree to escort a dirigible shipment of food to a drought-torn region of China. But Nu Hai has some suspicions about Shi Long, which she finds aren't far off when she discovers the dirigible is set to explode...with them on board!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep20
programme.desc: Gongmen City Hustle - Po and the Kids make it to Gongmen City in search of the contact they heard has some info on the dirigible crash. Meanwhile, Xiao, mourning the presumed death of her new panda friends, takes off into the woods and meets a new friend.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep34
programme.desc: Marshtato Fairy / Do the Biggie - On the foggiest night of the year, the Marshtato Fairy magically delivers marshtatos to Troll Village, which every Troll loves and celebrates- except for Branch, who doesnt think the Marshtato Fairy exists. When Poppy encourages him to believe, Branch set out to prove Poppy wrong. /When Biggie accidentally invents a dance craze, he realizes how much he enjoys being the center of attention. Biggie and Guy set out to create another Troll dance sensation in order to keep Biggies big moment going.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep35
programme.desc: Hitting the Sky Note / Hug Fest - When Poppy discovers that Sky Toronto doesnt sing, she sets out to convince him that singing is the greatest joy in the world./Poppy shows Branch around his first Hug Fest, a Troll festival to celebrate hugs.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep1
programme.desc: Booving In / Sant Oh - Best friends Tip and Oh drive each other crazy when he moves into the human world with her./Oh stirs up trouble when he tries to act like Santa Claus.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep3
programme.desc: Sherman's Pet/ Marco Polo - Sherman begs Peabody to keep a Wolly Mammoth he names Captain Cools as his pet; Marco Polo wins three deadly noodle challenges to discover spaghetti.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep27
programme.desc: Changing Of The Guard - After fruitless searching the universe for Shiro, the Paladins struggle to accept that they must find a new pilot to join the team

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep53
programme.desc: Second To One - The Bloodwolf's been defeated, and all seems right in San Lorenzo. Puss, no longer the No. 1 hero and protector, gets restless and tries on a new hat.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep27
programme.desc: The Challenge/Home On Our Own - Fed up with the rowdy FAST crew, Chet challenges them to go without racing; Skid and Shadow must defend the clubhouse alone against Clip and Clap.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep8
programme.desc: Tuskist / Three Moon Festival - Scallop is afraid of her first tuskist appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelps first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House / To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep52
programme.desc: Un-King Me - When the kingdom is overrun with refugees, Julien is shocked that an old friend Koto and his Mountain Lemur army are preparing to attack

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep15
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 1 - When Stormfly is captured by a new enemy, Ryker Grimborn, and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup, Toothless and the team must rescue her before it's too late

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep16
programme.desc: Night Of The Hunters Pt 2 - As Hiccup and Snotlout race to rescue the others from Ryker and the Dragon Hunters, they don't realize Dagur and Heather are working with the enemy

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep51
programme.desc: The Obelisk - When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep52
programme.desc: The Bloodwolf - When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/BFFF - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesnt believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each others point of view. /When Branch decides its time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep25
programme.desc: The Phantom Of Club Moist - King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep25
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 1 - When El Circo Dos Grillos comes to town, Lucky and Spirit learn circus tricks.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep26
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 2 - With El Circo Dos Grillos in town, memories of Milagro prompt big changes for Lucky and Jim.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep9
programme.desc: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti - Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesnt want the others to hear whats in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement cant happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House / To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep29
programme.desc: Gorgey Girl / A Gran Adventure - Eep has the first pen pal in Gulp Gorge/Gran sends Ugga and Eep on the first treasure hunt when she decides to pass on her inheritance

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep30
programme.desc: 127 Owwws / 28 Fleas Later - Eep and Thunk become obsessed with a new trend known as quicktogramming/Grug accidentally causes the first outbreak of a super bug

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep39
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Polarizing Plight of the Pitiless Poopetrators - George and Harold want Cash Networth to buy the camp and fire Krupp. But before he'll agree to pony up the dough, Cash has a small request of his own.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep61
programme.desc: The Big Dumpling - The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep62
programme.desc: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135 - Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep39
programme.desc: Whimsy Wasps / Freeze Tag - When a type of insect (Whimsy Wasps) become attracted to Trolls Village due to the Trolls joyful lifestyles, Branch must convince them to tone it down in order to avoid being descended upon by a swarm of the wasps./ For the first time in Trolls Village, a game of freeze tag has broken out without the tagger declaring themselves. Poppy races to discover the identity of the mysterious tagger, before all of Trolls Village ends up frozen

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep218

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep177
programme.desc: The Funny Photo - While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?
